sentence: "We need to have a full immigration moratorium," said Trump-endorsed Joe Kent, an Army veteran running in a Washington state primary against U.S. Representative Jaime Herrera Beutler.
author: Ted Hesson and Alexandra Ulmer
title: U.S. Republicans Try To Out-Trump Each Other With Tough Border Rhetoric Ahead Of Election

sentence: In addition to Harriet Hageman, the challenger to Ms. Cheney, he is backing Joe Kent and Loren Culp, both of whom are running against House Republicans in Washington State who voted to impeach Mr. Trump.
title: The Right's Would-Be Kingmaker

sentence: And two congressional challengers whom Thiel has also supported -- Joe Kent in Washington and Harriet Hageman in Wyoming -- have mounted competitive bids against incumbent Republicans who voted to impeach former President Trump.
author: Gabby Orr and Michael Warren
title: Peter Thiel plans to wind down his involvement in 2022 after Vance's victory in Ohio
